faqs.question: Kunnen buitenlanders vastgoed kopen in Spanje?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. British citizens, EU nationals, and other international buyers have full property ownership rights. You'll need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE), but the process is straightforward with proper legal representation. Our team assists international buyers through all documentation requirements.

faqs.question: Wat zijn de kosten van het kopen van vastgoed in Spanje?
faqs.answer: Purchase costs typically include 6-8% property transfer tax (ITP), legal fees (approximately 1-2%), and notary fees (around €500-1,000). Budget total acquisition costs at approximately 9-10% above the purchase price. Ongoing costs include annual property tax (approximately 0.4-0.6% of cadastral value), community fees if applicable, and utilities. These costs remain substantially lower than UK equivalents.

faqs.question: Is de Costa Blanca een goede plek om vastgoed te kopen?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca is excellent for property investment and family living. The region demonstrates consistent 8% year-on-year price appreciation, strong rental demand from tourism, and established communities of international residents. Daya Nueva specifically offers authentic Spanish living with modern conveniences at lower costs than coastal tourist areas. Families appreciate safe neighborhoods, accessible schools, and Mediterranean lifestyle without overcrowding.

faqs.question: Wat zijn de kosten van levensonderhoud aan de Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Cost of living in Costa Blanca is 30-40% lower than UK equivalents. Groceries, dining, utilities, and services remain affordable while maintaining good quality. A family of four can live comfortably on €1,500-2,000 monthly, excluding mortgage payments. Healthcare and education costs are particularly economical compared to private UK providers.

faqs.answer: Alicante airport is 25 minutes from this property, with direct flights to multiple UK airports (London, Manchester, Birmingham) typically 2-2.5 hours flight time. faqs.question: Hoe is het weer aan de Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca enjoys Mediterranean climate with over 300 days of annual sunshine. Summers are warm (28-32°C), winters mild (12-16°C), and rainfall minimal. The climate supports outdoor living year-round, with comfortable temperatures for beaches and activities even in winter months.
